headline: The 4 megatrend risks companies are most worried about: Aon CEO
summary: Risk management and solutions firm Aon plc (AON) hosted its first Investor Day in nearly 20 years on Monday. Aon CEO Gregory Case comes on Catalysts for a conversation with host Madison Mills spanning a number of topics, including the megatrends that companies and consumers are most concerned about and supply chain complications stemming from President Trump's tariff policies. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Catalysts here.
